text:

title: Deserts
text:
This beloved desert is a mix of sweet from the guava jelly and salty from fresh cheese. Guava is a tropical fruit native to Mexico.

title: Deserts
text:
2 Brigadeiro



Brigadeiros


A Brazilian sweet made from sweet condensed milk, chocolate powder, butter, and sprinkles. It is usually served at birthday parties.
